headline: FirstEnergy (NYSE:FE) Is Increasing Its Dividend To $0.445
summary: FirstEnergy Corp.'s ( NYSE:FE ) periodic dividend will be increasing on the 1st of June to $0.445, with investors...

headline: FirstEnergy faces minimal direct tariff impact, but ‘uncertainty’ weighs on customers: CEO
summary: PJM states will play a key role in meeting resource needs, per FirstEnergy’s Brian Tierney. “It’s leadership by the governors in the states that are going to address this problem most directly," he said.
